This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"ScalingCalculated(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"availableBudget":"\u53ef\u7528\u9884\u7b97","period":"\u5468\u671f","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60","recordId":"\u8bb0\u5f55 ID","requestedAmount":"\u8bf7\u6c42\u91d1\u989d","scaleBps":"\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b","scaledAmount":"\u7f29\u653e\u540e\u91d1\u989d"}},"TreasuryUpdated(address,address)":{"params":{"newTreasury":"\u65b0\u5730\u5740","oldTreasury":"\u65e7\u5730\u5740"}},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculateScale(uint8,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"period":"\u5468\u671f\uff08\u5982\u5468\u7f16\u53f7\uff09","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b","requestedAmount":"\u8bf7\u6c42\u91d1\u989d"},"returns":{"scaleBps":"\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\uff08\u57fa\u70b9\uff09","scaledAmount":"\u7f29\u653e\u540e\u91d1\u989d"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_rewardToken":"\u5956\u52b1\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740","_treasury":"\u56fd\u5e93\u5730\u5740"}},"emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"\u91d1\u989d","to":"\u63a5\u6536\u5730\u5740"}},"getBudgetStatus(uint8)":{"params":{"pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b"},"returns":{"available":"\u53ef\u7528\u9884\u7b97","pending":"\u5f85\u53d1\u653e\u91d1\u989d","total":"\u603b\u9884\u7b97","used":"\u5df2\u4f7f\u7528\u9884\u7b97"}},"getPeriodScale(uint8,uint256)":{"params":{"period":"\u5468\u671f","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b"},"returns":{"scaleBps":"\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\uff08\u57fa\u70b9\uff09"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getScalingHistoryCount()":{"returns":{"count":"\u8bb0\u5f55\u6570\u91cf"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"markBudgetUsed(uint8,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"\u7531 RewardsDistributor \u5728\u5b9e\u9645\u53d1\u653e\u540e\u8c03\u7528","params":{"amount":"\u4f7f\u7528\u91d1\u989d","period":"\u5468\u671f","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b"}},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"previewScale(uint8,uint256)":{"params":{"pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b","requestedAmount":"\u8bf7\u6c42\u91d1\u989d"},"returns":{"scaleBps":"\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\uff08\u57fa\u70b9\uff09","scaledAmount":"\u7f29\u653e\u540e\u91d1\u989d"}},"refillBudget(uint8,uint256)":{"details":"\u4ece msg.sender \u8f6c\u5165\u4ee3\u5e01","params":{"amount":"\u5145\u503c\u91d1\u989d","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setAutoScale(uint8,bool)":{"params":{"enabled":"\u662f\u5426\u542f\u7528","pool":"\u9884\u7b97\u6c60\u7c7b\u578b"}},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"newTreasury":"\u65b0\u56fd\u5e93\u5730\u5740"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."}},"title":"PayoutScaler","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"AutoScaleUpdated(uint8,bool)":{"notice":"\u81ea\u52a8\u7f29\u653e\u914d\u7f6e\u66f4\u65b0\u4e8b\u4ef6"},"BudgetRefilled(uint8,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"\u9884\u7b97\u5145\u503c\u4e8b\u4ef6"},"BudgetUsed(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"\u9884\u7b97\u4f7f\u7528\u4e8b\u4ef6"},"BudgetWarning(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"\u9884\u7b97\u4e0d\u8db3\u544a\u8b66\u4e8b\u4ef6"},"ScalingCalculated(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\u8ba1\u7b97\u4e8b\u4ef6"},"TreasuryUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"\u56fd\u5e93\u5730\u5740\u66f4\u65b0\u4e8b\u4ef6"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"BPS_DENOMINATOR()":{"notice":"\u57fa\u70b9\u5206\u6bcd\uff08100%\uff09"},"BUDGET_WARNING_THRESHOLD_BPS()":{"notice":"\u9884\u7b97\u544a\u8b66\u9608\u503c\uff0820%\uff09"},"MAX_SCALE_BPS()":{"notice":"\u6700\u5927\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\uff08100%\uff09"},"MIN_SCALE_BPS()":{"notice":"\u6700\u5c0f\u7f29\u653e\u6bd4\u4f8b\uff0810%\uff09"},"OPERATOR_ROLE()":{"notice":"\u64cd\u4f5c\u5458\u89d2\u8272\uff08Keeper getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
